description:
You are in the dashboard.
Login via [bookingflix.com/en/sign-in.html](https://bookingflix.com/en/sign-in.html)

1. Click on ***Appointments***.
2. Click on ***Add appointment***. Alternatively, you can also add an appointment via the appointment overview.
3. Select the desired appointment booking calendar.
4. Click on ***Add Repeat*** if you want to set recurring appointments at regular intervals. You can set the number of repeats and the frequency. For example, every 2 days, every 4 weeks, once a month.
5. Click on ***Check appointment*** to prevent a possible overbooking. If an appointment is already entered, you will receive an error message.
title: Create recurring appointments
